message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
